sentences.sContent: It was in ancient times that the thought of pedagogical pragmatics began to gestate and form.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was in ancient times that the thought of pedagogical pragmatics began to gestate and form.
sentences.sCn: 古代是教学语用学思想的孕育和形成时期。

remMethod.val: gest(=carry带有) + ate → 有了 → 怀孕

trans.tranCn: 怀孕， 孕育； 构思
trans.tranOther: to carry (developing young) in the uterus during pregnancy
